name: O V E R D O S E
name_original: O V E R D O S E
description:
Lapdog of Lilith and wielder of an ancient cursed Relic, you are tasked with cleaning house among the ranks of Hell. Take down The Apostles and kill anyone who gets in your way.

ONE HIT ONE KILL. STOP MOVING AND YOU'RE DEAD.

THIS IS A TEST BUILD AND PROOF OF CONCEPT OF THE GAME, EVERYTHING IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE.

CONTAINS TUTORIAL + TWO LEVELS.
